pullrequest.title: Static camera when following a model

content.raw:
The problem is that there are still two modes that coexist in this pull request:

* Follow a model at any time
* Track a visual at startup

The parameters in track_visual now affect both modes.

The first mode should work well and be affected by all parameters except the `name` element.

The first mode requires the `name` element to be set and its behaviour is the same as before this pull request:

* The camera does not change its orientation
* One cannot exit this mode

I just made a change to this pull request (and the related pull request in sdformat) to make sure that the second mode does not become activated by default. It is now mandatory to provide a visual name to enable this mode.

I am not sure if that second mode is still needed. I have never been able to use it effectively, but it is the only mode that tracks a visual and not a model, so it may be useful in that regard.
